Title: Paint it Red!
Description:
They shot out our engines and we floated here - HERE! Right in the firing line of the enemy!

You know what to do, $n. Get below decks and man those guns!

Show these scum that they're in OUR line of fire!
ObjectivesText: Use a Gunship Turret to kill 80 Thunder Hold troops and destroy 9 Thunder Hold cannons.
